64  }

75 
81  double factor() const { return m_factor; }
82 
89  Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> exponents() const {
90  Eigen::Matrix<double,7,1> exp;
91  for (int i = 0; i < 7; ++i)
92  exp[i] = m_exponent[i];
93  return exp;
94  }
95 
97  double convertToBase(const double number) {
98  return m_factor * number;
99  }
100 
102  double convertTo(const double number, const Units& units);
103 
105  std::string toString() const;

112  friend Units operator*(const Units& left, const Units& right);
113  friend Units operator/(const Units& left, const Units& right);
114  friend Units operator^(const Units& left, const double power);
115 
117  friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& out, const Units& units) {
118  out << units.toString();
119  return out;
120  }
121
